results.title: Simvastatin protection against acute immune-mediated glomerulonephritis in mice.
results.text_hl: By contrast, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ did not alter the course of established @<m>DISEASE_Nephritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009393 @@@nephritis@@@.
